article.title: Gonsalves Assigned to Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff

tags.tag: U.S. Army Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff

article.text: Brig. Gen. Ryan F. Gonsalves, USA, has been assigned director of operations, readiness and mobilization, Office of the Deputy Chief of Staff, G-3/5/7, U.S. Army, Washington, D.C.Â
